comment:
Galti se achha labmate mil gaya mujhe xD. The more I knew him, the more harami he felt. But he's one of the most balanced people I've ever known.
Will miss that phase of saath me daant khaana (research) and the lab. I think half of our convos were, confirming if ma'am left for home xD
